# Roland Kákonyi - Personal Site

## About
Senior Software Engineer in Vienna building video players and SDKs for iOS/tvOS/watchOS and React Native, plus AI-driven media workflows. Expert in Vertex AI and Google Agent Development Kit (ADK). Lately I’ve been leaning into agentic engineering (since mid‑2025) as part of how I build.

## Core Skills
- Video Playback & Streaming (HLS, FairPlay Streaming)
- Apple Platforms (iOS, tvOS, watchOS, Objective-C, Swift)
- React Native & Mobile SDKs
- AI/ML Engineering (Vertex AI, Google ADK, Agentic Workflows)
- Backend & DevOps (Python, Node.js, Cloud Infrastructure)

## Experience

### Bitmovin (Apr 2020 – Present)
Senior Software Engineer
- AI-driven video workflows (Scene Analysis, recognition/segmentation)
- Apple Player SDK (iOS/tvOS/watchOS)
- React Native Player SDK lead
- HLS & FairPlay Streaming expert

### Mimo (Jun 2019 – Mar 2020)
iOS Developer
- Educational app development, maintainability, UX focus.

### E2 Communications GmbH (Aug 2014 – May 2019)
Mobile Application Developer
- iOS app development, custom push notification stack, CI/CD automation.

### Webstar Csoport Kft. (2011 – 2014)
iOS/Android/Software Developer
- Mobile games (Cocos2d-x), EPUB3, Web/PHP, Linux server admin.
